title: Admin Panel - CS2
footer: © 2025 — Created by Amauri Bueno dos Santos with support from Copilot. Clean code, sharp server.
cmd_status: Displays the current status of the CS2 server via RCON.
cmd_css_ban: Bans a player using their SteamID64.
cmd_css_unban: Unbans a player using their SteamID64.
cmd_css_mute: Mutes a player on the server.
cmd_css_addadmin: Adds an admin using SteamID64, name, group, and permission levels.
cmd_css_removeadmin: Removes an admin using their SteamID64.
cmd_css_unmute: Unmutes a player using their SteamID64.
cmd_meta_list: Lists all plugins loaded by MetaMod.
cmd_meta_version: Displays the current version of MetaMod.
cmd_css_plugins_list: Lists all active plugins from CSS Admin.
